name: cookperfecteggs
0:
”Alexa, open cook perfect eggs”
”Alexa, start cook perfect eggs”
”Alexa, launch cook perfect eggs”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cook perfect eggs
des:
Cooking eggs is easy. 
But cooking eggs perfectly every time is not as simple as you might think. 
With this skill 'cook perfect eggs', Alexa will guide you with step by step instructions on how to cook your eggs perfectly each and every time. 
Don't settle for just good eggs anymore. 

Demand perfect eggs with the How to cook perfect eggs skill. 

You can say:

"Alexa, open cook perfect eggs"
"Alexa, start cook perfect eggs"
"Alexa, launch cook perfect eggs"

After you have enjoyed your perfectly cooked eggs please come back and leave us a review and tell us your favourite way to eat your eggs (my fav is soft poached eggs on buttered toast with hummus, wilted spinach and a balsamic glaze!)
